source_text: KoBold shall grant Catalina a 1% net smelter return royalty upon completion of the Exploration Rights Transfer from Catalina to KoBold, half of which may be bought back by KoBold at any time for a consideration of AUD $1,000,000.
additional_details: The royalty is granted by KoBold to Catalina. This means KoBold pays the royalty and Catalina receives it. KoBold has the option to buy back half (0.5%) of the royalty for AUD $1,000,000.
